sentences.english: Smooth mirror reflective finish on a marble bathroom countertop enhances its looks.
sentences.chinese: 浴室大理石台面的镜面反射可以增强其视觉效果。

sentences.english: The special design also allows the unit to be neatly flush-mounted in desktops.
sentences.chinese: 此外，独特的设计还使该装置可以平整地嵌入台面中。

sentences.english: Reducing the scratch between workpiece and surface of table, especially for process of thin and mild material.
sentences.chinese: 减少台面与板材的摩擦，特别适合较薄较软板材加工。

sentences.english: But the service life that the stand or fall of in- house matrix is affecting mesa of fire prevention board.
sentences.chinese: 但内部基质的好坏影响着防火板台面的使用寿命。

sentences.english: Do not strike matches or lighters, try to avoid coughing whilst your opponent is at the table.
sentences.chinese: 当你的对手在台面击球时，不能划火柴或点燃打火机。

sentences.english: The framework and countertop are fabricated from 300 series stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 框架结构和工作台面的材质为300系列不锈钢。

sentences.english: Please quote decal adhered to table top permanently and option to adhere decal to case.
sentences.chinese: 请报至工作台面贴花坚持永久选项坚持贴花大小写。

sentences.english: At IKEA, you can choose between pre-cut and custom-made worktops.
sentences.chinese: 宜家提供预切割和定制切割的操作台面。

sentences.english: Solidtop sinks almost cover the entire range of Solidtop countertop colors.
sentences.chinese: 秀丽台星盆系列包括了几乎整个秀丽台台面色谱范围。

sentences.english: Please keep clean of the drinking straight platform, Do not splash water on it.
sentences.chinese: 请保持直饮台面清洁，勿将水洒在台面上。

sentences.english: Four thin white towers, or minarets, rise from the corners of the terrace.
sentences.chinese: 台面的角落耸立着四个白色的细塔，也叫宣礼塔。

sentences.english: Decor and countertop changes are required twice a year.
sentences.chinese: 装饰和厨房工作台面一年要更换两次。
擦拭厨房的工作台面和辗转。

sentences.english: The time of wire scrap absorption may be set for correct adjustment, to bring the clean operation desk.

sentences.english: The article treats of the software of the dynamic weighbridge with microcomputer.
